summary: This document is an email correspondence from Jes Staley to Jeffrey Epstein inquiring about the name of Epstein's marina in St. Thomas. It highlights the personal connection between Staley, a high-ranking executive at J.P. Morgan, and Epstein.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is identified as the Chief Executive Officer of J.P. Morgan, reaching out to Epstein for information regarding his marina.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient of the email, indicating a personal relationship with Staley.

connections.description: Staley is reaching out to Epstein in a personal context, asking about his marina.

keyFacts: Jes Staley, CEO of J.P. Morgan, emailed Jeffrey Epstein.
The email was sent on January 6, 2011.
Staley inquired about the name of Epstein's marina in St. Thomas.
The correspondence indicates a personal relationship between Staley and Epstein.
